prodNameC: 基體埃人類白血球第一型抗體篩檢試劑套組
ingredientsDesc: MS or MP microwell: flat-bottom microwell plate or strips to which affinity purified HLA class I glycoprotein have been immobilized. TCW concentrated wash (10x): Tris (hydroxymethyl) aminomethane buffered solution containing sodium chloride and Tween 20. SDQ Specimen Dilution: Phosphate buffered saline solution containing bovine albumin. SB Substrate Buffer: This solution contains diethanolamine and magnesium chloride. SS Stopping Solution: 3M sodium hydroxide. AG  Conjugation: Alkaline phosphatase conjugated goat affinity purified antibody to human immunoglobulin G (IgG). PN PNPP (p-nitrophenyl phosphate) Substrate: Crystalline powder. PC Positive Serum Control: Human Serum NC Negative Serum Control: Human Serum PSPlate Sealers
applicantAddr: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路188巷48號8樓
efficacy: 基體埃人類血球第一型抗體篩檢試劑套組是應用固相免疫連接分析法(ELISA)的試劑套組,為抗HLA Class I抗體的定性實驗。
mdFormat: QS12G：44 tests/kitQS3G：40 tests/kit。註銷規格：QS3G：40 tests/kit。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.0001 人類白血球抗原分型盤
